actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to provide the Secretary of Agriculture forfeiture authority.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to subject to forfeiture anything of value that is furnished or intended to be furnished by any person in exchange for coupons or authorization cards in any manner not authorized by such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to provide the Secretary of Agriculture forfeiture authority.
